name: EVANY
description: What is the project about? Evany is a utility token that can replace the traditional payment method. Use Evany everywhere, anytime. What makes your project unique? Our vision at Evany is to become a leading utility token within the GPoint Wallet ecosystem and beyond. We envision a future where our users can transact with Evany seamlessly and securely.
